Package org.forgerock.openidm.quartz.impl

package org.forgerock.openidm.quartz.impl

Package org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler

This package contains a custom JobStore implementation that uses the OpenIDM Repository Service for persistence, a custom Job implementation, wrapper classes to serialize and contain meta-data for Quartz scheduling objects, and other utility classes.
  • Class
    Description
    CalendarWrapper
    A wrapper that contains the name and serialize form of a calendar.
    ExecutionException
    An exception that is throw for failure during scheduled work execution
    JobGroupWrapper
    A wrapper the contains all necessary information for a Jobs's group
    JobWrapper
    A wrapper that contains all necessary information about a Job.
    RepoJobStore
    A JobStore implementation used for persistence with the OpenIdm Repository Service.
    RepoJobStoreUtils
     
    ScheduledService
    OSGi services wanting to be schedulable via the Scheduler service must implement this interface.
    SchedulerServiceJob
    Scheduler service job using Quartz Invokes the configured ScheduledService in OSGi
    StatefulSchedulerServiceJob
     
    TriggerGroupWrapper
    A wrapper the contains all necessary information for a Trigger's group
    TriggerWrapper
    A wrapper that contains all necessary information for a Trigger.
